rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
孟德尔随机化揭示糖尿病与胰腺癌之间的因果关系宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。本研究通过使用孟德尔随机化 (MR) 方法和广泛的人类全基因组关联研究 (GWAS) 数据集，调查糖尿病与胰腺癌易感性之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Mendelian-randomization-reveals-a-causal-relationship- Between-diabetes-mellitus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Mendelian-randomization-reveals-a-causal-relationship- Between-diabetes-mellitus-and-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0166285b-ee87-4d96-b934-65100e9510b8 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 20:00:57 -0500 Mendelian randomization reveals a causal relationship between diabetes mellitus and pancreatic cancer
基因组研究揭示大麻使用障碍与肺癌风险之间的遗传联系《自然遗传学》杂志上的一项全基因组关联研究揭示了对大麻使用障碍的遗传学的见解，强调了其与精神病理学的密切关联以及与肺癌的因果关系，并提出了与单纯使用大麻不同的遗传途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Genome-study-unveils-genic-ties- Between-cannabis-use-disorder-and-lung-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Genome-study-unveils-genic-ties- Between-cannabis-use-disorder-and-lung-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3ed2d2d-811c-4cd4-81f6-a29f8da90130 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:35:00 -0500 Genome study unveils genetic ties between cannabis use disorder and lung cancer risk
研究人员确定了治疗巴斯综合征的潜在新药物靶点在今天发表的《自然代谢》论文中，匹兹堡大学的研究人员详细介绍了治疗巴斯综合征的潜在新靶点和小分子候选药物，巴斯综合征是一种罕见的、危及生命且目前无法治愈的遗传性疾病，具有毁灭性的后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-drug-target-for-treating-Barth-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Researchers-identify-pottial-new-drug-target-for-treating-Barth-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2081a9a3-6e24-45d2-960f-e0863e27a19a Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:27:34 -0500 Researchers identify potential new drug target for treating Barth syndrome
唾液分析突破：检测帕金森病患者的认知能力下降阶段研究人员利用综合宏蛋白质组学分析表明，唾液微生物群和生物分子的变化可以表明帕金森病患者的认知障碍阶段，从而提供了一种潜在的诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Saliva-analysis-breakthrough-Detecting-cognitive-decline-stages-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Saliva-analysis-breakthrough-Detecting-cognitive-decline-stages-in-Parkinsone28099s-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b09c2c7b-83cb-4418-9b76-2b94782404d2 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:26:00 -0500 Saliva analysis breakthrough: Detecting cognitive decline stages in Parkinson’s patients
新的人工智能方法捕捉胚胎发育的节奏和阶段动物胚胎从受精卵细胞到功能有机体的过程中经历了一系列特征性的发育阶段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-AI-approach-captures-the-tempo-and-stages-of-embryonic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-AI-approach-captures-the-tempo-and-stages-of-embryonic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aeaa415a-ce8a-4a82-a5e4-c652ac7dec39 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:22:00 -0500 New AI approach captures the tempo and stages of embryonic development
Y染色体的突破性解码彻底改变了消化系统疾病的研究人类Y染色体的完整解码取得了人类遗传学的重大突破，为消化系统疾病的研究开辟了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Breakthrough-decoding-of-the-Y-chromosome-revolutionizes-digestive-disease-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Breakthrough-decoding-of-the-Y-chromosome-revolutionizes-digestive-disease-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8232ce8-1c8f-402c-b53c-750db34a6ffe Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:11:04 -0500 Breakthrough decoding of the Y chromosome revolutionizes digestive disease research
新调查显示英国成年人的不信任程度令人担忧对英国成年人的最新调查显示，虽然大多数人认为自己普遍信任他人，但 19.6% 的人认为自己普遍不信任，5.3% 的人认为非常不信任。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-survey-reveals-worryingly-high-levels-of-mistrust-among-UK-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/New-survey-reveals-worryingly-high-levels-of-mistrust-among-UK-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=233e348b-a0dd-4a7e-b062-467c33e02e21 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 19:03:00 -0500 New survey reveals worryingly high levels of mistrust among UK adults
基因疗法可以逆转罕见的遗传性 DOOR 综合征的症状几十年来，人们对癌症和心脏病等在大部分人群中广泛传播的疾病进行了大量研究。因此，由于对影响许多人的疾病的长期研究努力，治疗方法得到了极大的改进。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Gene-therapy-could-reverse-symptoms-of-rare-hereditary-DOOR-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Gene-therapy-could-reverse-symptoms-of-rare-hereditary-DOOR-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1930724c-2484-4c13-9b7f-de0532600ed2 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 18:59:04 -0500 Gene therapy could reverse symptoms of rare, hereditary DOOR syndrome
半剂量的 COVID-19 加强剂可引发类似的免疫反应，但副作用更少一项新的研究表明，减少广泛使用的 COVID-19 加强疫苗的剂量，可以在成人中产生与全剂量类似的免疫反应，而且副作用更少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Half-dose-COVID-19-booster-elicits-similar-immune-response-with-fewer-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Half-dose-COVID-19-booster-elicits-similar-immune-response-with-fewer-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=324e1dee-b47e-4cc4-ade7-4cb16a7eb4d0 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 18:38:12 -0500 Half-dose COVID-19 booster elicits similar immune response with fewer side effects
波恩免疫学家获得 200 万欧元资助，利用纳米抗体的力量控制炎症波恩免疫学家 Florian I. Schmidt 教授在波恩大学医院 (UKB) 的先天免疫研究所进行研究，他获得了欧洲研究理事会颁发的巩固基金 (Consolidator Grant)，为他的研究项目 DEFLAMMATION 提供 200 万欧元资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Bonn-immunological-receives-e282ac2-million-grant-to-harness-the-power-of-nanobodies-for-inflammation-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231123/Bonn-immunological-receives-e282ac2-million-grant-to-harness-the-power-of-nanobodies-for-inflammation-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dd14710-e83b-4e92-aa89-f8dd5558fae1 Thu, 23 Nov 2023 18:29:50 -0500 Bonn immunologist receives €2 million grant to harness the power of nanobodies for inflammation control
